channel.title: Primary Productivity on Masumbuko Semba's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Primary Productivity on Masumbuko Semba's Blog

item.title: Primary Production, chlorophyll-concentration and Sea surface temperature in Tanzania waters
item.description: Introduction require(tidyverse) require(oce) require(highcharter) require(lubridate) files = dir("./extracted/", pattern = "chl_", full.names = TRUE) sites = c("EEZ", "Mafia", "Pemba", "Zanzibar") chlorophyll chl = list() for (i in 1:length(files)){ chl[[i]] = files[i] %>% readxl::read_excel()%>% rename(date = 1, year = 2, chl = 3) %>% mutate(month = month(date), day = 15, site = sites[i], date = make_date(year = year, month = month, day = day)) %>% arrange(date) } chl = chl %>% bind_rows() gg = ggplot()+ geom_raster(data = chl, aes(x = year, y = month, fill = chl), interpolate = T, na.
